page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT STATISTICS
page.content: Ayloff School made up a questionaire for their parents about their work. We had 208 replies. 1. Work locally 54.5% 2. Work in London 43% 3. Self-employed 15% 4. Works for small firm 23% 5. Works for large corporation 59.8% 6. Manual workers 53.5% 7. Full-time work 64% 8. Satisfied with job 8l% 9. Shift workers l6.7% l0. Overtime 47.8% ll. Special clothing required 41.6% 12. Compulsory retirement age 55.9% 13. Pensionable job 54% 14. Union membership 52% 15. Specialised qualifications 74% 16. Unemployed l.5%
